products.name: M-Sand (Manufactured Sand)
products.description: High-quality manufactured sand for all construction needs. Premium manufactured sand produced under controlled conditions for consistent quality and performance.

products.name: P-Sand (Plastering Sand)
products.description: Fine plastering sand for smooth wall finishes. Specially processed plastering sand for achieving smooth and durable wall finishes.

products.name: Blue Metal (Jalli)
products.description: Crushed stone aggregate for concrete and road construction. High-quality crushed blue granite stone available in various sizes.

products.name: Red Bricks
products.description: Traditional clay bricks for wall construction. Traditional kiln-fired clay bricks known for durability and thermal insulation.

products.name: Fly Ash Bricks
products.description: Eco-friendly bricks made from fly ash. Modern eco-friendly bricks offering better strength and uniform size.

products.name: Concrete Blocks
products.description: Solid and hollow concrete blocks for construction. Machine-made concrete blocks available in solid and hollow variants.

products.name: Cement
products.description: Premium quality cement from top brands including UltraTech, ACC, Ramco, Dalmia, and Chettinad.

products.name: AAC Blocks
products.description: Lightweight autoclaved aerated concrete blocks. Modern AAC blocks offering excellent thermal insulation and faster construction.

products.name: Size Stone / Rough Stone
products.description: Natural stones for foundation and compound walls. Natural rough stones and cut size stones for foundation work.

faqs.question: What areas do you deliver to?
faqs.answer: We deliver across Tamil Nadu with a primary focus on Southern regions including Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Kanyakumari, Madurai, and surrounding districts. We also serve parts of Kerala and Karnataka for bulk orders.

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
faqs.answer: Minimum order varies by product: M-Sand/P-Sand - 1 unit (approximately 1 cubic meter), Blue Metal - 1 ton, Bricks - 1000 pieces, Cement - 10 bags. For smaller quantities, please contact us directly.

faqs.question: Do you provide quality certifications?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our materials meet IS (Indian Standard) specifications. We provide quality test reports and certifications upon request. Our M-Sand and aggregates are tested regularly for gradation, silt content, and other parameters.

faqs.question: What are your payment terms?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, bank transfer, UPI, and cheques. For new customers, advance payment is required. Regular customers can avail credit facilities based on their transaction history. GST bills are provided for all orders.

faqs.question: How quickly can you deliver?
faqs.answer: Standard delivery within 24-48 hours for orders placed before 2 PM within our primary service area. Express delivery available for urgent requirements. Delivery time may vary for remote locations or bulk orders.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer attractive discounts for bulk orders and regular customers. Volume-based pricing is available for construction projects. Contact us with your requirements for a customized quotation.
